# containerTraitCollection

**Instance Property**

The trait collection of the sheet’s container view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var containerTraitCollection: UITraitCollection { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is the same as the window’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWindowScene/traitCollection], and doesn’t include overrides from the sheet’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPresentationController/overrideTraitCollection].

## Accessing the properties of the context

- **maximumDetentValue**: The maximum value of a detent.
